page.title: 15Biography: C.J.Taylor M.B.E.
page.content: Diary of Events 1907 Charles Taylor was born in B,ham. 1912 Attended Yardley Primary School. 1918 Attended Waverley Grammar School. 1925 Began uncertificated teaching. 1926 Attended Teacher Training College. 1928 Began teaching career in B,ham. 1929 Began Boys' Brigade Co.Small Heath 1947 Became Head of St. Silas' School 1953 Became Head of Jenkins St. School- renamed Goodwin after previous head. 1972 Retired from Goodwin School. 1981 Awarded M.B.E. for service to Boys Brigade: now honorary Captain of Small Heath,Vice President of B,ham. 1982 Appointed Chairman of the Board of Governors of Lyndon Green Juniors. Comment Charles Taylor takes an active part in his role of governor. He values the contact he still has with old pupils who are scattered all over the world.
